content.about: Prestige Estate Services provides professional art appraisal services specializing in Fine art collections, Antiques, IRS estate tax compliance, Insurance documentation, General personal property. With Decades experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Team members include Alicia Weaver, Elizabeth Lovett, and Stephanie Calman. Serves San Antonio and surrounding areas.

reviews.author: Nancy W.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. The appraisal report was comprehensive and well-documented.

reviews.author: Patricia R.
reviews.content: Their expertise in fine art made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: David D.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation, and Prestige Estate Services delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

content.about: Gurr Johns provides professional art appraisal services specializing in High-value collections, Expert witness services. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Global firm managing over $10 billion in valuations annually.

reviews.author: David T.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend Gurr Johns for any art appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Linda W.
reviews.content: Provided an incredibly thorough appraisal of my art collection. Gurr Johns's knowledge of the market is impressive.
